name: Equinox (itch) (riks, Christian Gulick, eXimiusMax, dwu3)
description:
Equinox! A chill space shooter made by a few dudes in 8 hours! 

Use A, and D to move, Space to Shoot! 

Has Controller Support with Xbox one/ps4 controllers (and probably more...)

upon death press 1 to reload the level, and escape to quit the game!

Kris Camp - Programming/art/animation

eXimius - Art/Animation

Christian Gulick - Programming/Art

David Wu- Programming
